tasks.name: Open Free Common Packs
tasks.description: Claimed free pack, scrapped all 3 commons for ~42 Essence. Next pack in ~16h.

tasks.name: Complete Daily Missions
tasks.description: Point Picker missions available (Limited and Classic Rising Stars) but require Limited cards from today's specific game teams. Cannot complete without matching cards.
tasks.note: Need Limited cards from today's game teams to participate

tasks.name: GW34 Lineup Review Completed
tasks.description: Verified 2 Limited Champion lineups for GW34 (Feb 19-22). Sorare limits Limited Champion to 2 lineups max. ⚠️ Deandre Ayton marked GTD in lineup #2.
tasks.note: Cannot create 3rd lineup - Sorare caps Limited Champion at 2 entries

tasks.name: Scrap Duplicate Commons
tasks.description: Scrapped 3 commons from free pack for ~42 Essence. No other duplicates to scrap.

tasks.name: Claim GW33 Rewards
tasks.description: GW33 ended. All 3 lineups fell short of rewards: L1 6,220th (175pts, 29pts short), L2 5,996th (179pts, 25pts short), L3 6,105th (177pts, 27pts short). No rewards to claim.
tasks.note: No rewards earned — all lineups ~25-29pts below threshold

tasks.name: Spin the Wheel
tasks.description: Spun the wheel with 1 ticket earned from daily pack. Won 200 Essence!

tasks.name: Daily Essence Update
tasks.description: Essence now at 3.1K (up from 2.9K). Gained ~242 Essence today (42 from scraps + 200 from wheel).

activeGames.note: GW34 starts Feb 19. Lineups close in 5d 22h.
